=Insurance=

==Board of Directors Insurance==
This is so the board can't be sued
===Research===
*Freeside Atlanta hackerspace's = 300/year
*Twin Cities Maker and Urban Stew use [http://www.fracturedatlas.org/ Fractured Atlas] ($200 membership a year+quote) $600-900

===Quotes===
*Lovitt & Touch√©-$1k-$2500 per year-$1-$2M in coverage
*Waiting on Carolina Casualty Insurance Company - ~$1100 1M in coverage

==Liability==
===Research===
*NYC Resistor's Insurance cost is 4k per year (Source Bre Pettis)
*NoiseBridge cost was about 2k per year(including Board insurance) ([http://lists.hackerspaces.org/pipermail/discuss/2009-January/000137.html Source ])
*Twin Cities Maker and Urban Stew use [http://www.fracturedatlas.org/ Fractured Atlas] ($200 membership a year+insurance quote)

===Quotes===
*Waiting on Cheeney Insurance--$836.00 yr, no medical, only 14 members?
*Waiting on Carolina, or whoever Jose's contact can find for us -- Unable to find us anyone willing

==Theft==
===Research===
NoiseBridge in the above source indicates this was 'too expensive'
